data.text: Iyyoob haasaa isaa itti fufee akkana jedhe:
“Ani jiʼoota darban, bara Waaqni na eege sana
yeroo ibsaan isaa mataa koo irratti ife, anis ifa isaatiin
yeroo ani nama jabaa ture,
yeroo Waaqni Waan Hunda Dandaʼu na wajjin ture,
yeroo daandiin koo dhadhaadhaan jiifame,
“Yeroo ani gara karra magaalaatti gad baʼee
dargaggeeyyiin na arganii karaa irraa goru;
hangafoonni sabaa dubbii afaanitti qabatanii
sagaleen namoota bebeekamoo hin dhagaʼamu ture;
Namni na dhagaʼu kam iyyuu na jaja;
ani hiyyeessa gargaarsa barbaachaaf booʼu,
Namni duʼuu gaʼe na eebbiseera;
Qajeelummaa akka uffata kootti uffadheera;
Ani nama jaameef ija,
Ani rakkataadhaaf abbaan ture;
Qarriffaa nama hamaa nan cabse;
“Ani akkana jedheen yaadee ture; ‘Manuma koo keessattin duʼa;
Hiddi koo gad fagaatee bishaan qaqqaba;
Ulfinni koo na keessatti haaraa taʼee jiraata;
“Namoonni calʼisanii gorsa koo eeggachaa
Erga ani dubbadhee booddee isaan deebiʼanii hin dubbanne;
Isaan akkuma nama bokkaa eeggatuutti na eeggatan;
Yeroo ani isaaniif seequtti isaan hin amanne;
Ani karaa isaaniif filee akka hangafa isaaniitti nan taaʼe;
